attributes.action: ban professional football and convert existing stadia to housing with allotments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taking both direct and indirect costs (policing, street cleaning, lost working hours, carbon production of people driving to matches, etc) football is a net drain on the British economy. Stadia should be converted to housing and allotments and former fans should be required to spend the equivalent time carrying out voluntary/charity work.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
